author: sifuluo
body:
#### PR description:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37282

That fixes the issue brought about by
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37188
title: [CMSSW_12_2_X] Fix CSC CLCT resolution validation plots
